application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Austin, TX, USA
description:
Our team inspires leading companies, schools, and government agencies to work smarter with Google tools like G Suite, Search, and Chrome. You reach out proactively to show customers how Google Cloud solutions can help them become more productive, mobile, and collaborative. You'll maintain relationships with clients and work cross-functionally to devise solutions and support for Google's clients.

The Google Cloud Small and Medium Business (SMB) team focuses on working with Small and Medium-sized Businesses, and we are looking for an SMB Account Manager to help to grow the business. In this role, you'll grow the Google Cloud portfolio within our existing G Suite customer base as you drive upgrades and cross sell opportunities. You will work closely with the G Suite and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Leadership team.

The Google Cloud teams work with customers from all industries in order to make them more productive, mobile and collaborative. As such, you will help ensure that customers get a tailored experience, from initial contact to full onboarding with Google Cloud. You will also work closely with our global SMB Account Management team to ensure that existing customers are optimizing Google’s suite of products.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience in Software-as-a-Service, Infrastructure-as-a-Service and Platform-as-a-Service (SaaS, IaaS, PaaS) Sales.
  • Ability to speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience translating analysis and insights into actionable business plans.
  • Experience executing email campaigns through marketing automation and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tools.
  • Understanding of the technology market, and a passion for Google applications and cloud computing.
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks with shifting priorities and varying deadlines.
  • Demonstrated organizational and project management skills.
responsibilities:
• Identify cross sell opportunities for Google Voice, Google Cloud Platform and more.
  • Scale cross sell strategies to global Account Management team and through partner resellers.
  • Drive G Suite upgrades to our Business and Enterprise product Stock Keeping Units (SKUs).
  • Work with reseller partners to generate business opportunities through the partner channel.
  • Help drive adoption and customer satisfaction via various communication channels.
title: Account Manager, Small and Medium Business, Google Cloud (English)
